While the makers are saying that the film is based on a Gujarati play, the fact they are not revealing is that this film Oh My God is a shameless copy of an Australian film, "The Man Who Sued God", directed by Mark Joffe. So much for originality! Paresh Rawal is the only redeemable factor. Akshay Kumar hams as usual and supporting actors like Mithun and Govind Namdeo give a very distasteful take on known Hindu religious figures.
